info.author: Joel Boehland
info.description:
MOPPY intends to be an easy to use, powerful library for exploring Meta Object
Programming in Python. While Python already has facilities for runtime
inspection and for changing the structure of objects at runtime, it can often be
tedious and error-prone to find and change many objects at a time. Moppy intends
to make many of these tasks easier and less error prone.
info.name: MOPPY
info.html_description: MOPPY intends to be an easy to use, powerful library for exploring Meta Object Programming in Python. While Python already has facilities for runtime inspection and for changing the structure of objects at runtime, it can often be tedious and error-prone to find and change many objects at a time. Moppy intends to make many of these tasks easier and less error prone.
